dc:title: Assigning authorities for the NHS Wales Enterprise Master Patient Index (EMPI).
dc:description: Not all of these authorities actually generate first-class identifiers, but are current or past applications or systems within NHS Wales.
dc:creator: Information standards board, Welsh Reference Data Service (WRDS).

columns.dc:description: A simple integer representing an authority code.
A human-readable description of the authority.
A human-readable acronym of the 'owning' organisation.
A UK NHS Organisation Data Services code representing the organisation.
